subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty?
question_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Bapa Rawal was the founder of the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty.
explanation_hi: बापा रावल गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following empires was founded by Pratihar dynasty?
question_hi: प्रतिहार वंश द्वारा किस साम्राज्य की स्थापना की गई थी?
explanation_en: The Pratihar Empire was founded by Pratihar dynasty.
explanation_hi: प्रतिहार वंश ने प्रतिहार साम्राज्य की स्थापना की थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the famous king of Chauhan dynasty?
question_hi: चौहान वंश के प्रसिद्ध राजा कौन थे?
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan was a famous king of Chauhan dynasty.
explanation_hi: पृथ्वीराज चौहान चौहान वंश के प्रसिद्ध राजा थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: What was the capital of the Pratihar Empire?
question_hi: प्रतिहार साम्राज्य की राजधानी क्या थी?
explanation_en: The capital of the Pratihar Empire was Bhojpur.
explanation_hi: प्रतिहार साम्राज्य की राजधानी भोजपुर थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the famous queen of Chauhan dynasty?
question_hi: चौहान वंश की प्रसिद्ध रानी कौन थी?
explanation_en: Padmini was a famous queen of Chauhan dynasty.
explanation_hi: पADMINI चौहान वंश की प्रसिद्ध रानी थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following fort was built by Rana Kumbha?
question_hi: राणा कुम्भा द्वारा कौन सा किला बनाया गया था?
explanation_en: Kumbhalgarh Fort was built by Rana Kumbha.
explanation_hi: राणा कुम्भा ने कुंभलगढ़ किला बनाया था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the last king of the Chauhan dynasty?
question_hi: चौहान वंश का अंतिम राजा कौन था?
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan was the last king of the Chauhan dynasty.
explanation_hi: पृथ्वीराज चौहान चौहान वंश का अंतिम राजा था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following kingdoms was founded by Guhil-Sisodia dynasty?
question_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश द्वारा कौन सा राज्य स्थापित किया गया था?
explanation_en: Mewar Kingdom was founded by Guhil-Sisodia dynasty.
explanation_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश ने मेवाड़ राज्य की स्थापना की थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the famous minister of Rana Kumbha?
question_hi: राणा कुम्भा के प्रसिद्ध मन्त्री कौन थे?
explanation_en: Mahatma Bhagwan Das was the famous minister of Rana Kumbha.
explanation_hi: राणा कुम्भा के प्रसिद्ध मन्त्री महात्मा भगवान दास थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following forts was built by Pratihar dynasty?
question_hi: प्रतिहार वंश द्वारा कौन सा किला बनाया गया था?
explanation_en: Bhojpur Fort was built by Pratihar dynasty.
explanation_hi: प्रतिहार वंश ने भोजपुर किला बनाया था।
